Class Patron

java.lang.Object
Patron
public class Patron extends Object
The Patron class represents a library patron who can borrow and return books.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Patron(String name, String address, String phoneNum)
    Constructs a new Patron object with the specified name, address, and phone number.

      Returns:

    • searchBorrowedBookISBN

      public Book searchBorrowedBookISBN(long ISBN)
      Searches the list of borrowed books by ISBN.
      Parameters:
      ISBN - The ISBN of the book to search for.
      Returns:
      The book matching the specified ISBN, or null if not found.
